name: Jean-Philippe Bossuat
description:
I am the principal developer and co-author of the library Lattigo, a Go module that implements Ring-Learning-With-Errors-based homomorphic-encryption primitives and Multiparty-Homomorphic-Encryption-based secure protocols.

I have been working as a research scientist and cryptography software engineer for the past fire years. My work consists in researching, designing, implementing and integrating privacy preserving machine learning and statistical analytics in large scale B2B applications. The
